EmailTemplate.subject: You are invited to an ASA Training Series via webex!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join American Student Assistance® (ASA)
National FFELP guarantor, American Student Assistance® (ASA), is pleased to offer an online training series focused on some of the most pressing topics affecting financial aid administrators today.
Please join your colleagues and ASA’s knowledgeable, experienced training staff for one or more of these timely and informative sessions.
All sessions will be held conveniently via WebEx from 1:00 p.m. – 2:00 p.m. ET except July 29, 2009, and September 2, 2009, which will be held from 12:00 p.m. – 1:00 p.m. ET.
Below are the scheduled dates and the topics:
July 8, 2009 Implementing a Program of Financial Literacy on Campus
July 15, 2009 Financial Literacy – Getting Your Students to Pay Attention
July 22, 2009 Ten Key Ideas FAO's Should Know When Implementing Financial Literacy Programs
July 29, 2009 Regulatory Update
August 5, 2009 Innovations in Entrance and Exit Counseling
August 12, 2009 Negotiated Rulemaking Update
August 19, 2009 The A to Zs of Written Policy Requirements
August 26, 2009 SAFRA (HR 3221) Overview
September 2, 2009 Repayment Options: Featuring Income Based Repayment
September 9, 2009 Lower Your CDR: Cohort Default Management Best Practices
September 16, 2009 Helping Your Students Create a Financial Roadmap
September 23, 2009 Put Loans - The Impact on Institutions and Borrowers
For additional information or registration please:
· Go to: http://www.amsa.com/fap/training/index.cfm · E-mail us your name, phone number and enrollment details to: training@amsa.com · Call our Training Department at (800) 999-9080, ext. 3099 (1-617-728-4200)
All of ASA’s training events are offered free of charge.
